remarks: The covers relation implies no in-betweenness.  Part of proof of Lemma 7.5.1 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 31.  ( ~ cvnbtwn4 analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2011.)
statement:
cvrle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
cvrle.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrnbtwn4 $p |- ( ( K e. Poset /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) /\ X C Y ) -> ( ( X .<_ Z /\ Z .<_ Y ) <-> ( X = Z \/ Z = Y ) ) ) $.
